Package org.bohdansharubin.models

Class Hat

java.lang.Object
org.bohdansharubin.models.Clothes
org.bohdansharubin.models.Hat
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Clothes>
public class Hat extends Clothes
Represents a Hat item.

A Hat is a concrete subclass of Clothes with a fixed ClothesType.HAT type. The type of Hat instance cannot be changed after creation.

Additional characteristics specific to Hat include whether it is waterproof and its HatType.

  • Constructor Details

    • Hat

      public Hat(String color, int europeanSize, AmericanSize americanSize)
      Constructs a Hat with the specified basic parameters.
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the hat; must not be null or blank
      europeanSize - the European size; must be within the valid range
      americanSize - the American size; must not be null
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is invalid

    • Hat

      public Hat(String color, int europeanSize, AmericanSize americanSize, boolean isWaterProof, HatType hatType)
      Constructs a Hat with all parameters.
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the hat; must not be null or blank
      europeanSize - the European size; must be within the valid range
      americanSize - the American size; must not be null
      isWaterProof - indicates whether the hat is waterproof
      hatType - the type of the hat; must not be null
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if hatType is null

    • Hat

      public Hat(Clothes other, boolean isWaterProof, HatType hatType)
      Copy constructor.

      Creates a new Hat instance by copying the state of the given Clothes object and applying additional Hat-specific properties.

      Parameters:
      other - the Clothes object to copy from; must not be null
      isWaterProof - indicates whether the hat is waterproof
      hatType - the type of the hat; must not be null
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if hatType is null
